Title: A Race to the Finish
Description:
Everyone loves a good snail race! In the most exciting races, every snail has a chance to win.

You can help a snail win by giving it treats. Watch how fast it makes them go!

Grab a bag of treats and toss them in the path of the snails. See if you can get Brulee to win!

Objectives.Text: Brulee Treats used on snail racer Brulee
